main.controllers

Class GHSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.controllers.GHSearchController

  • @Controller
public class GHSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller: GHSearchController Description: This Controller handling the Github search. it will get the parameter and than Use the explained (and will explained again in "Members" section) beans to get the json content and modifying the model to return the login and the followers details after saving / updating the database. Members: handler - injected URLHandlerBean to make a connection to the API+param paths. jsonConverter - injected JsonConverterBean to convert the document (that we connected to) content and convert it to json. DBHandler - injected DatabaseHandlerBean to save or update the db according the search if the user is valid and exist. rootobj - to use cross tries scopes JsonObject to get the model info we need to present.
